definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind, pledge (Ar. h.abala bind; cf. Aram. h.bal, h.abel travail; [[חֲבַל]] pledge (but rare and dub.); esp. h.ablo0 cord, field, [[חַבְלָא]] cord, h.ebl0, [[חֶבְלָא]] pain, esp. of travail; Sab. [[חבל]] border-territory, or field, Sab. Denkm.:48.49; Eth. h.abala: Zim:BP 93 n., comp. As. naḫbalu, rope, snare (but ḫ = x))—
bind, only in [[חׂבְלִים]], name of one of Zec.'s symbolic staves, Zec 11:7, Zec 11:14 symbol. of fraternity. Esp.

bind by taking a pledge of, hold by a pledge, sq. acc. pers. Pr 20:16, Pr 27:13, Job 22:6; take or hold in pledge, sq. acc. rei Ex 22:25 ( JE), De 24:6, De 24:6, De 24:17, Job 24:3; sq. acc. cogn. [[חֲבׂל]] Ez Eze 18:16; [[עַל־עָנִי יַחְבָּׂלוּ]] Job 24:9 prob. pregn. (v. Di) take pledges (getting power) over the poor; [[בְּגׇדִים חֲבֻלִים]] Am 2:8 garments taken in pledge.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֵחָ֫בֶל לוֹ]] Pr 13:13 becometh pledged to it (i.e. pledged to pay the penalty, opp. [[יְשֻׁלָָּם]]), so Ew Hi De Now Str RV:m VB. > sub II. [[חָבַל]] q. v.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חִבְּלָה]] Ct So 8:5; [[חִבְּלַתְךָ]] Ct So 8:5; Impf. [[יְחַבֶּל־]] Ps 7:15; —writhe, twist, hence travail; of mother Ct So 8:5, So 8:5 (c. acc. of child; ‖[[יְלָדָָתְךָ]]); metaph. of wicked man :[[יְחַבֶּל־אָָוֶן וְהָרָה עָמָל וְיׇלַד שָֽׁקֶר ]] Ps 7:15.
